au_895791: #!/bin/bash
find -name "genome.txt" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' path
do
    base=$(basename --suffix=".txt"  "$path")
    new_path="${1%/}"/"$base"$counter".txt"
    echo "$path" "$new_path"
    counter=$(( $counter +1 ))
done

#!/bin/bash
find "$2"  -name "$1" -print0 | while IFS= read -r -d '' path
do
    base=$(basename --suffix=".txt"  "$path")
    new_path="${3%/}"/"$base"$counter".txt"
    echo "$path" "$new_path"
    counter=$(( $counter +1 ))
done
